content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2.3 SETTING UP WORKING ENVIRONMENT: Microsoft Teams\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Microsoft Teams is the hub for team collaboration in Office 365 that integrates not only our Technical Interview Team (TI Team) but also other EPAM employees as well, content, and tools our team needs to be more engaged and effective. Teams brings everything together in a shared workspace where you can find all the important information at one second, chat, meet, share files, and work with business apps.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please download Microsoft Teams on your desktop & your mentor will add you to all the teams we use every day.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
